content:
"An innovation is one of those things that society looks at and says, if we make this part of the way we live and work, it will change the way we live and work" - Dean Kamen

Whether attending a multi-day conference or intimate pitch meeting, you’re steps from wherever you need to be from the top of Nob Hill. The hotel sits at the only intersection of San Francisco’s legendary cable car lines, and our ideal location connects you with the entire city. Union Square. Chinatown. The Financial District. Everything just minutes away. Grab-and-go breakfast options and fair trade coffee fuel your mornings, especially if you’re getting to work on one of our Blix ebikes.
